    Services and Prices

    Hand Stripping

    2 hours and over
    Includes all the services in the full groom service although the coat is removed by hand rather than clipping or scissoring. Coat checks and consultations required.

    Mini Groom

    1 hour and over
    Includes all services in the bath option with the additional trim around the face, paws and hygiene area. Suitable for maintenance of long coated breeds and puppies.

    Bath & Blow Dry

    1 hour and over
    Includes a hypoallergenic relaxing bath and a blow dry. Complete brush and comb through of the coat. Ear and nail trim included.

    Full Groom

    1 hour 30 minutes and over
    a full groom includes a bath, blow dry and brush through. With either a de-shedding treatment or any full haircut. (Styles upon request). This also includes an ear clean and a nail trim.

    Hand Stripping

    2 hours and over
    Includes all the services in the full groom service although the coat is removed by hand rather than clipping or scissoring. Coat checks and consultations required.

    Hand Stripping

    2 hours and over
    Includes all the services in the full groom service although the coat is removed by hand rather than clipping or scissoring. Coat checks and consultations required.

    2 hours and over
    Includes all the services in the full groom service although the coat is removed by hand rather than clipping or scissoring. Coat checks and consultations required.
